name: MineFighter
description:
This game is an amazing twist on 1962 game SpaceWar! recreated into a really fun and cool Minecraft style game called MineFighter. Its totally amazing and is super fun to play. It looks beautiful and its very enjoyable.

Player 1 Controls: W to accelerate A and D to turn F to shoot R to use power-ups Player 2 Controls: Up Arrow to accelerate Left and Right Arrow to turn . to shoot , to use power-ups Recommended: Play on volume of 10 for dell
